offer_title: SPECIAL SAVINGS at PickMe Food
offer_details_1:
Offer 1

Enjoy 100% cashback with your Nations Trust Bank American Express Credit Card

Valid for the first month of the PickMe Pass monthly subscription for the first-time PickMe Pass users

Valid from 1st February 2025 to 31st March 2025

 

Offer 2

Enjoy additional 20% savings on PickMe Food with your Nations Trust Bank American Express Credit Card

Valid for bills above LKR 3,000

Maximum savings: LKR 750
 
Valid every Sunday from 9 AM to 11 PM, from 23rd February 2025 to 30th March 2025
offer_details_2:
Offer 1
The Monthly PickMe Pass Subscription is priced at Rs 549.
The Cashback Offer is applicable to first-time PickMe Pass users.
First-time subscribers will automatically receive a 14-day free trial, with the card being charged only after the trial period ends.
Cashback will be processed as PickMe Points on the next working day.
Cashback cannot be requested to the card or bank account.
PickMe Points can be used for any PickMe services.
PickMe Points cannot be withdrawn or transferred.
It is mandatory for the user to pay the first subscription using an NTB AMEX Credit Card after the trial period to receive the cashback.
The offer is valid from 1st Feb 2025 to 31st Mar 2025 (inclusive of both the first and last day).
The last day for disbursing cashback will be 15th April 2025.
One user is eligible to use this offer only once.
The PickMe Pass Monthly Subscription is valid for 30 days.
PickMe and the bank reserve the right to stop or amend this promotion at any time without prior notice.
PickMe and the bank reserve the right to withhold cashback from any user who is found to be misusing the promotion.

Offer 2


This offer is applicable to users who have subscribed to PickMe PASS.
The offer is valid for a single transaction per cardholder on each offer day.
Free delivery is available with the offer.
In case of any disputes regarding the terms and conditions, the decision of PickMe and the Bank shall be final.
This offer cannot be exchanged for cash, nor can it be combined with any other promotions or offers provided by PickMe

offer_title: SPECIAL SAVINGS at Best Western Elyon Colombo
offer_details_1:
Enjoy special savings with your Nations Trust Bank American Express Credit Card

10% savings on deluxe rooms (BB/HB/FB Basis) 
10% savings on beverages
10% savings on the à la carte menu

Valid from 1st January 2025 to 31st December 2025

For reservations, email to resmgr@bestwesterncolombo.com, with copies to sales@bestwesterncolombo.com & invoicing@bestweterncolombo.com
offer_details_2:
Child Policy on accommodation
Children aged 0-5 years sharing with their parents-stay free of charge.
Children aged 06-12 years -25% on sharing double room rate. (Sharing parents Bed / on the basis booked)
Please note Hotel will be compelled to strictly comply with Government Regulations relating to the serving of Alcohol + Meats + Entertainment on days of abstinence declare by the state
Booking Policy
50% advance payment is necessary to secure a firm booking.
Until the advance payment is received, rooms will be subject to availability, and we cannot guarantee a tentative block.
Check-in Time - 02.00 p.m. / Check-out Time - 12.00 noon
Early Check-in & Late Check-out Policy
Late check-out charges, subject to availability, are as follows:
Between 12:00 PM and 6:00 PM: Half of the room rate applied on a room-only basis.
After 6:00 PM: 100% of the room rate
Early check-in charges, subject to availability, are outlined as follows:
Arrivals prior to 09:00 AM will incur charges equivalent to the previous night's stay.
Check-ins between 09:00 AM and 12:00 PM will be billed at half the applicable room rate.
Accommodations for drivers are not provided on the premises.
Cancellation Policy
In case of cancellation, a 50% charge based on the booking will apply for cancellations made prior to 48 hours.
For cancellations made within 48 hours of the booking, a 100% charge based on the booked basis will be applied.
Reservation Process
Please send all reservation requests to resmgr@bestwesterncolombo.com, with copies to sales@bestwesterncolombo.com & invoicing@bestweterncolombo.com
Please send all inquiries related to Sales & Marketing- Ms.Roshi Lokuge - sales@bestwesterncolombo.com
Payments
Payments to be made prior to arrival by cash.
Please note cheque payment should be done three working days prior to arrival
Bank Details
Cheque to be drawn in favor of - Elyon Colombo (Pvt) Ltd
Beneficiaries Name - Elyon Colombo (Pvt) Ltd
Bank - Nation Trust Bank - Narahenpita
Account Number - 100810007391
Other Terms & Conditions
The presence of the cardholder is mandatory during check-in.
Full payment for the reservation must be completed using the same credit card used for booking.
Each cardholder is limited to booking a maximum of 02 rooms
This offer cannot be combined with any other existing promotions at the hotel.
Room bookings are subject to availability.
